FAQ'S
##  [When is the India vs Pakistan match?](https://www.indiatoday.in/sports/cricket/t20-world-cup/schedule#accordion-1)
The India vs Pakistan clash at the T20 World Cup 2026 will be held on February 15.
##  [When are the semi-finals and final?](https://www.indiatoday.in/sports/cricket/t20-world-cup/schedule#accordion-2)
The semi-finals of the T20 World Cup 2026 will be held on March 4 and 5. The final of the tournament will be held on March 8.
##  [Will Pakistan play all their matches in Sri Lanka?](https://www.indiatoday.in/sports/cricket/t20-world-cup/schedule#accordion-3)
Yes, Pakistan will be playing all their matches in Colombo. Their matches will be played at the SSC stadium and the India game will be hosted by the R. Premadasa stadium.
##  [How many teams are participating in the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026?](https://www.indiatoday.in/sports/cricket/t20-world-cup/schedule#accordion-4)
A total of 20 teams will participate in the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026.
The [T20 World Cup](https://www.indiatoday.in/sports/cricket/t20-world-cup) 2026 is all set to capture the imagination of the fans. The competition structure is built to keep the intensity high at every stage. Twenty teams will first be split into four pools of five, with each side facing the other four teams in its group once. The leading two teams from each pool will move on to the Super 8 phase, where they will be reorganised into two groups of four. From there, the top two teams in each Super 8 group will progress to the business end of the tournament, featuring two semi-finals followed by the final.
